description:
I know you will recover you child’s well being in a short space of time which of course has a direct effect on your own happiness as a parent, I have seen the most difficult cases become success stories, very satisfying for me to see such tranzformations take place.
I have worked with people from every type of background. In some extreme cases, agressive, impulsive, desperate or simply completely out of control. Others convinced themselves their child’s ADHD or behavioral problems were for life and that it could not be cured.
It’s a joy to see these families setting themselves free from ADHD or bad behavior and the great news is that it is not hard to do. It just takes action. If YOU are ready to take that action, I AM ready to help you every step of the way.
Let’s do this together. Let’s take control of your families life and tranzform it.
title: TranZ+Future: Tranzforming your child’s life
instructors: Dr. Mark Goble, Investigacion y  Estudio Empresariales
